Title: IELTS-Preparation
Discription: HEXAS IELTS Preparation Course is designed with our four course books which includes 25 classes with free Speakers Club, Listening Club, Reading Club, Writing Club and SAC. We also provide partial and mock tests with our course

Title: IELTS LIFE SKILLS
Discription: We have been teaching IELTS LIFE SKILLS course with 100% success. Our full time experts are here to help with your LIFE SKILLS preparation for spouse visa

Title: Spoken English
Discription: Hexas Spoken English Course This course has 24 classes with free Speakers Club and 3 Exams also Debate competition

Title: Fundamental of Computer
Discription: This course will help you to have basic knowledge regarding computer that you certainly need either in academic or professional life
